verses.text: \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w upon|strong="H7121"\w* thee; \w make|strong="H2363"\w* \w haste|strong="H2363"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H6963"\w*: Give ear \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, \w when|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* thee.

Let \w my|strong="H3559"\w* \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* \w be|strong="H6440"\w* \w set|strong="H3559"\w* \w forth|strong="H3559"\w* \w as|strong="H6440"\w* \w incense|strong="H7004"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w thee|strong="H6440"\w*; \w The|strong="H6440"\w* \w lifting|strong="H4864"\w* \w up|strong="H4864"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H3559"\w* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* \w as|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H4503"\w*.

\w Set|strong="H7896"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w watch|strong="H5341"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*; \w Keep|strong="H5341"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w door|strong="H1817"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*.

\w Incline|strong="H5186"\w* \w not|strong="H1077"\w* \w my|strong="H5186"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w to|strong="H3820"\w* \w any|strong="H1697"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*, \w To|strong="H3820"\w* \w practice|strong="H5953"\w* \w deeds|strong="H5949"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w* \w With|strong="H3898"\w* \w men|strong="H7451"\w* \w that|strong="H1697"\w* \w work|strong="H6466"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H7562"\w*: \w And|strong="H1697"\w* \w let|strong="H5186"\w* \w me|strong="H1697"\w* \w not|strong="H1077"\w* \w eat|strong="H3898"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w their|strong="H5186"\w* \w dainties|strong="H4516"\w*.

Let \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w smite|strong="H1986"\w* \w me|strong="H3588"\w*, \add it shall be\add* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w*; \w And|strong="H7218"\w* let \w him|strong="H3588"\w* \w reprove|strong="H3198"\w* \w me|strong="H3588"\w*, \add it shall be as\add* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w upon|strong="H7451"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*; Let \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w refuse|strong="H5106"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*: \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H5750"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w* \w shall|strong="H6662"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* \w continue|strong="H5750"\w*.

\w Their|strong="H8085"\w* \w judges|strong="H8199"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w thrown|strong="H8058"\w* \w down|strong="H8058"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w sides|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w rock|strong="H5553"\w*; \w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* words; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w sweet|strong="H5276"\w*.

\w As|strong="H3644"\w* \w when|strong="H3644"\w* \w one|strong="H6310"\w* ploweth \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w cleaveth|strong="H1234"\w* \w the|strong="H1234"\w* earth, Our \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* \w are|strong="H6106"\w* \w scattered|strong="H6340"\w* at \w the|strong="H1234"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \w Sheol|strong="H7585"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w unto|strong="H5315"\w* \w thee|strong="H5869"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w*: \w In|strong="H5315"\w* \w thee|strong="H5869"\w* \w do|strong="H5869"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w take|strong="H2620"\w* \w refuge|strong="H2620"\w*; \w leave|strong="H6168"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w destitute|strong="H6168"\w*.

\w Keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w me|strong="H8104"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w snare|strong="H4170"\w* which \w they|strong="H3027"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w laid|strong="H3369"\w* \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w me|strong="H8104"\w*, \w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w gins|strong="H4170"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w workers|strong="H6466"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* iniquity.

Let \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w into|strong="H5307"\w* \w their|strong="H5307"\w* own \w nets|strong="H4364"\w*, \w While|strong="H5704"\w* \w that|strong="H5307"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w withal|strong="H3162"\w* \w escape|strong="H5674"\w*.
